forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. South southwest wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
